resources.string: WARNING : If you are using the app while driving, please focus on your driving.\n\nThe displayed values are retrieved using the GPS and Cellular signals. The values shown may not be accurate. The users should not rely on these values as it may display inaccurate results due to certain reasons such as low signal strength. The app is not responsible if any damage is caused by using the values displayed. Keeping the screen on for a long period of time can cause damage to the phone\'s screen.
To change the units of speed or distance tap on the speed/distance to choose the unit.
